summary: This Mod adds 5 diefferent Hoods from the Monk robes as stanalone Items.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod adds 5 diefferent Hoods from the Monk robes as stanalone Items.
Now you can wear them with Armors and other Clothing.
There have an Magicka Enhanchemend with +30 Magicka.

You can find them at Dragonsreach at Farengar\'s room.

If you like it, please endorse it.

And watch my other actualy mod: http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20534
author: TheWitcher5688
